subject: Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Kaname Shinozaki’s solo homer in the fourth inning broke a tie, and Japan, clinched a spot in the Little League World Series finals with a 3-2 win over Mexico.
snippet: Kaname Shinozaki’s solo homer in the fourth inning broke a tie, and Japan, clinched a spot in the Little League World Series finals with a 3-2 win over Mexico.
